fields.name: txtTaxPayerName
fields.title: Name(s) shown on return  - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxPayerSSN
fields.title: Your social security number - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtYearVeh1
fields.title: Line 1(a). Vechicle 1. Year

fields.name: txtYearVeh2
fields.title: Line 1(a). Vechicle 2. Year

fields.name: txtMakeVeh1
fields.title: Line 1(a). Vechicle 1. Make

fields.name: txtMakeVeh2
fields.title: Line 1(a). Vechicle 2. Make

fields.name: txtModelVeh1
fields.title: Line 1(a). Vechicle 1. Model

fields.name: txtModelVeh2
fields.title: Line 1(a). Vechicle 2. Model

fields.name: txtVin1
fields.title: Line 2(a). Vehicle 1. Vehicle identification number (see instructions)

fields.name: txtVin2
fields.title: Line 2(a). Vehicle 2. Vehicle identification number (see instructions)

fields.name: txtDteVehPlacedService1
fields.title: Line 3(a). Vehicle 1. Enter date vehicle was placed in service (MM/DD/YYYY)

fields.name: txtDteVehPlacedService2
fields.title: Line 3(a). Vehicle 2. Enter date vehicle was placed in service (MM/DD/YYYY)

fields.name: txtMaxCdtAllowable1
fields.title: Line 4(a). Vehicle 1. Tentative credit (see instructions for amount to enter)

fields.name: txtMaxCdtAllowable2
fields.title: Line 4(a). Vehicle 2. Tentative credit (see instructions for amount to enter)

fields.name: txtBusiInvestUsePerc1
fields.title: Part 2 Credit for Business/Investment Use Part of Vehicle. Line 5. Vehicle 1. Business/investment use percentage (see instructions)

fields.name: txtBusiInvestUsePerc2
fields.title: Line 5. Vehicle 2. Business/investment use percentage (see instructions)

fields.name: txtMulTentativeCdtBusiPerc1
fields.title: Line 6. Vehicle 1. Multiply line 4 by line 5 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtMulTentativeCdtBusiPerc2
fields.title: Line 6. Vehicle 2. Multiply line 4 by line 5 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSumCdtBusiInvest
fields.title: Line 7. Add columns (a) and (b) on line 6 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtCdtFrmPartnerCorporation
fields.title: Line 8. Alternative motor vehicle credit from partnerships and S corporations (see instructions)

fields.name: txtCdtBusiInvestPart
fields.title: Line 9. Business/investment use part of credit. Add lines 7 and 8. Partnerships and S corporations, stop here and report this amount on Schedule K. All others, report this amount on Form 3800, Part III, line 1r  - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSubBusiInvestFrmTentative1
fields.title: Part 3 Credit for Personal Use Part of Vehicle. Line 10. Vehicle 1. If you skipped Part II, enter the amount from line 4. If you completed Part II, subtract line 6 from line 4 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSubBusiInvestFrmTentative2
fields.title: Line 10. Vehicle 2. If you skipped Part II, enter the amount from line 4. If you completed Part II, subtract line 6 from line 4 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSumCdtPersonalVeh
fields.title: Line 11. Add columns (a) and (b) on line 10 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtRegularTaxBefCdt
fields.title: Line 12. Enter the amount from Form 1040, 1040-SR, or 1040-NR, line 18 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSumReduceRegularTax
fields.title: Line 13. Personal credits from Form 1040, 1040-SR, or 1040-NR (see instructions)

fields.name: txtNetRegularTax
fields.title: Line 14. Subtract line 13 from line 12. If zero or less, enter -0- and stop here. You cannot claim the personal use part of the credit - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtCdtPersonalUsePart
fields.title: Line 15. Personal use part of credit. Enter the smaller of line 11 or line 14 here and on Schedule 3(Form 1040), line 6. Check box c on that line and enter '8910' in the space next to that box. If line 14 is smaller than line 11, see instructions - This field is automatically calculated for you
